title: Wonders of the World for Kids
creator: Broov

extendedInfo.description: This is an application for Kids aged 2 - 10 years. Teach them about the various Wonders of the World using this application.1. Call button blocked to avoid making unknowing calls by kids.2. Send feedback within the application.3. Move to sdcard option.4. Swipe to move next/previous screens.You can also send additional names and images so that we will add it in our next release, mailid: aatrala@broov.in
